build scripts..just minor fixes and making it player 10
FxComponent - required parts must be present--not just defined
FxContainer - removing some dead code around IUIComponent since everything should be an IVisualElement now
Group - move around logic for removing a previously parented object.  This helps deal with graphic elements with shared display objects
GraphicElement - need to handle display object getting changed as well
AdvancedLayoutFeatures - remove Vector import (now that build scripts are fixed, it works fine)
QE Notes: Write tests for addAll() and allAllAt(), check that required parts are required in the first state
tests: checkintests, mustella DataGroup, List, Group, FxContainer, FxDataContainer
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix bug http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-18714 minWidth & minHeight not respected for GraphicElements (Ellipse, etc.)

The fix is to make sure measureWidth and measuredHeight for GraphicElement are restricted by the explicit min/max limits during the measure phase, the same way it works for UIComponent.  This also resulted in a small change to Path, since there we were assuming the measuredWidth and measuredHeight were the natural bounds of the Path.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Flex SDK Bug Fix - Add snapshot support for 3D transformed GraphicElements
Added in support to take a bitmap snapshot of a 3D transformed GraphicElement.
Added a flag to getBitmapData to return a bitmap of the target either in the local or global coordinate space.
Also, fixed a bug in the bitmap snapshot logic for a 2D GraphicElement that was sharing its displayObject.

Note that the 3D snapshot isn't accurate if you have set maintainProjectionCenter on an ancestor. There are also limitations when rotation is applied. In addition, getting a local 3D snapshot isn't too accurate once you start scaling ancestors.
QE Notes: Add mustella tests for getBitmapData
Doc Notes: Document that getBitmapData now supports 3D transforms

Cleanups in Group and DataGroup.  Change RTEs so not as many will have to be localized.  Also, when mxmlContent is set, we clean up the old mxmlContent better and send out remove events.
QE Notes: Need to write tests when the mxmlContent gets set (remove events get dispatched).
tests: checkintests, mustella Group, DataGroup, FxDataContainer, FxContainer, FxList, and GraphicTags tests
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Mostly rename changes in Group and FxContainer.
1.  GraphicElement.elementHost:GroupBase -> GraphicElement.parent:DisplayObjectContainer (parent already exists in the current code-base...I’m just removing elementHost now)

2.  Group content APIs now use “element” instead of “item.”  The new methods were added a while ago, but the old ones co-existed.  These particular changes remove the old methods and strongly type the new ones to deal with IVisualElements rather than Objects.  Here are the overall changes:
3.  Group and FxContainer's mxmlContent property is now strongly typed as an Array of IVisualElements instead of an Object
4.  Removing ITransformable...there's no need for it.
5.  Had to update Mustella for these changes (the Perforce changes are checked in, and here's the mustella.swc change for checkintests)
QE Notes: Joan and Steve worked with me on changing all the SDK QA tests.

tests: checkintests, Mustella FxContainer, Group, and DataGroup (Joan ran all tests on an earlier version of these changes, so hopefully nothing broke in the meantime).  Some of the Group/DataGroup ones were failing for me, but I'm pretty sure they're all excluded (tests don't seem to exclude for me when I VPN in...)
